00049 //
00050 // delete_range
00051 //
00052 // 5 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef LEMUR_DELETE_RANGE_HPP
00056 #define LEMUR_DELETE_RANGE_HPP
00057 
00058 #include <vector>
00059 #include <stack>
00060 #include <map>
00061 
00062 template<typename VectorType>
00063 void delete_vector_contents( std::vector<VectorType>& vector ) {
00064   typedef typename std::vector<VectorType>::iterator vec_iter;
00065 
00066   vec_iter begin = vector.begin();
00067   vec_iter end = vector.end();
00068   vec_iter iter;
00069 
00070   for( iter = begin; iter != end; iter++ ) {
00071     delete *iter;
00072   }
00073 
00074   vector.clear();
00075 }
00076 
00077 template<typename MapKey, typename MapValue>
00078 void delete_map_contents( std::map<MapKey, MapValue*>& mp ) {
00079   typedef typename std::map<MapKey, MapValue*>::iterator map_iter;
00080 
00081   map_iter begin = mp.begin();
00082   map_iter end = mp.end();
00083   map_iter iter;
00084 
00085   for( iter = begin; iter != end; iter++ )
00086     delete iter->second;
00087 
00088   mp.clear();
00089 }
00090 
00091 template<typename VectorType>
00092 class VectorDeleter {
00093 private:
00094   std::vector<VectorType>* _vec;
00095 
00096 public:
00097   VectorDeleter() : _vec(0) {}
00098   VectorDeleter( std::vector<VectorType>& vec ) : _vec(&vec) {}
00099   ~VectorDeleter() {
00100     if( _vec )
00101       delete_vector_contents<VectorType>( *_vec );
00102   }
00103 
00104   void setVector( std::vector<VectorType>& vec ) {
00105     _vec = &vec;
00106   }
00107 };
00108 
00109 template<typename StackType>
00110 class StackDeleter {
00111 private:
00112   std::stack<StackType*>* _stack;
00113 
00114 public:
00115   StackDeleter() : _stack(0) {}
00116   StackDeleter( std::stack<StackType*>& stack ) : _stack(&stack) {}
00117   ~StackDeleter() {
00118     if( _stack ) {
00119       while( _stack->size() ) {
00120         delete _stack->top();
00121         _stack->pop();
00122       }
00123     }
00124   }
00125 
00126   void setStack( std::stack<StackType*>& stack ) {
00127     _stack = &stack;
00128   }
00129 };
00130 
00131 #endif // LEMUR_DELETE_RANGE_HPP
